item.description:
Join us for an amazing moonlight paddling tour on the Charles. We will depart from the Newton Boathouse at 7:30 and will stop for some light snacks and desserts along the way.

This will be a private tour for just our group and should be lots of fun.

The tour is limited to 30 people and I have provided a link to sign up with Charles River Canoe & Kayak directly. If you respond yes please follow the link and pay since when the tour fills up on our end I will need to change responses if you have not paid.

http://www.adventurec...

This is a custom tour so you might get some availability messages but it will allow you to complete your booking of the event. Just follow the link below....you will need to put in the number of people you are signing up and then select the event at the bottom with a departure date of 7/30/2009.



Hope to see you on the river.
Judie
item.name: Moonlight Canoe trip
